page.title: 19RUDDINGTON PEOPLE--MILKMAN
page.content: {MICHAEL JACK}is one of the popular people in{Ruddington.}He is the village milkman but he is also on many committees such as the{James Peacock {Trust.}He has lived in {Ruddington } all his life and has seen many changes. There have been a lot of houses built which has meant more shops.When it was smaller there used to be a village {Sports Day}and the{Wakes}used to be held on the green. Every-body used to join in but now it is just a fair and the only custom kept is the service on Sunday. The only change in milk delivering is a motorised float and a lot of people order skimmed milk because they are slimming or think it is better for their health.
